channel.title: Bug Bounty Hunting
channel.description: Recent content on Bug Bounty Hunting

item.title: Building a Custom Vulnerability Scanner with Python: Automating Security Checks for Web Applications
item.description: Introduction linkWhile automated vulnerability scanners offer a broad range of tests, they often fall short when it comes to identifying application-specific vulnerabilities. Building a custom vulnerability scanner with Python empowers you to create targeted checks tailored to your unique needs. This tutorial will guide you through the process of developing a basic scanner leveraging Python’s flexibility and powerful libraries. Prerequisites link Basic knowledge of Python programming Familiarity with HTTP requests and web application security concepts Python 3 installed on your system Setting up the Environment link Install necessary libraries: pip install requests beautifulsoup4 Create a new Python file: e.

Mastering Burp Suite Intruder: Advanced Fuzzing and Payload Customization for Vulnerability Discovery
item.description: Introduction linkBurp Suite Intruder is a powerful tool for automating customized attacks against web applications. While it’s often used for simple brute-forcing attacks, its true potential lies in its ability to perform sophisticated fuzzing with precise payload manipulation. This tutorial will guide you through advanced Intruder techniques to uncover hidden vulnerabilities. Setting the Stage: Target Selection and Scope Definition link Identify your target: Choose a specific functionality or parameter within the web application you want to test.
